players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I believe we should focus on finding the mafia among us. With Charlie's sudden death, it's more important than ever that we work together to identify and vote out any suspected mafiosos."
Bob: "I agree with Alice. Let's keep a close eye on each other and share any suspicions we may have. We need to work together as a team to ensure the safety of our group."

Bob: "I think we should consider the possibility that Diana might be the mafia. She didn't share any suspicions during the first discussion round, which is unusual for a villager. It's important that we keep an open mind and consider all possibilities."
Diana: "I will not make any accusations. I suggest we continue to observe each other and share our findings."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
